lead_paragraph: ARMSTRONG--Elizabeth (Lili) Sweet. Lili died on February 20, 2016 surrounded by loved ones. She is survived by her devoted husband of 62 years, Donald Armstrong, M.D. and their four children Rebecca, Alison, Priscilla and Bradford, four grandchildren and three great-grandchildren. Lili was born in Beijing, China in 1932. She was a Medical Anthropologist with a focus on Asia. Lili was an accomplished scholar having attended Goucher College, New York University, and Columbia University. Lili and Don traveled throughout the world lecturing at medical meetings; at one time worked at a refugee camp at the Thai and Cambodian border. While living in New York and Santa Fe, NM, Lili loved to entertain, talk politics, go birding and cook, especially Chinese food, and shared many wonderful meals with family, friends and colleagues. 1/3
